text: Lando Fiorini (born Leopoldo Fiorini; 27 January 1938 – 9 December 2017) was an Italian actor and singer. He was known for having sung songs from Rome in Italian and Romanesco.Addio al cantante e attore Lando Fiorini, articolo su La Stampa del 9 dicembre 2017 His cabaret show Ma ‘ndo vai se il decoder non-ce l’hai satirized Italian television. Fiorini died in Rome, Italy on 9 December 2017 of mesothelioma at the age of 79.Musica, è morto Lando Fiorini, notizia del 9 dicembre 2017 sul sito di Rainews ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from mesothelioma Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Rome Category:Singers from Rome
title: Lando Fiorini
